descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Whiterun...there is a Rumour about a Female Khajit joining the Companions in Whiterun,Exactly we are in Whiterun now...wat ? Never Mind...ALL RIGHT cut the Chatter !
Her name is Kalizen Renzen she is a Half Mage and Half Warrior...well,she always appears in the backyard training(Jorrvaskr) .She always sitting on the bench with the companions.
Easy to find Her.

Caution-Be careful using her too...she just like Sharkaria too can blow everyone away...and it may Alert the Guards Too...You Have Been Warned.

Name-Kalizen Renzen
Voice-FemaleEvenToned
Combat Style-csHumanMagic
Spells-Fireball(L),Unrelenting Force Shout,Grand Healing(L)
Relationships-Player's Ally
Factions-You can Marry her for figthing against Bosses or Dragons.


Credits
Thanks to the Mod Creators or Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
The requirement needed for the NPC is..
Khajiit Tail Remover by tiagopsyko
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4390/?
CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?.
Bikini-Trouble CHSBHC by golgappa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51207/?
TERA Weapons Collection for Skyrim by Iromizu
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27463/?
CHSBHC Conversions with BBP by Nimbonius(KK Barkeeper V5)Only.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7475/?
TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female by asianboy345
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?
Warrior Within Weapons by BloodFree
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?
Dwarven rifle 2nd Generation by mahty
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54498/?
Osare Food by anano
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24759/?
Only...and that's all.
author: CyrusHawke
